name: ISO 9001:2015
description: Quality Management Systems standard ensuring consistent quality and customer satisfaction through systematic approach to quality management.
scope: Design, development, and manufacture of precision machined components and assemblies

name: AS9100D
description: Aerospace quality management system standard built on ISO 9001 with additional aerospace industry requirements.
scope: Manufacturing of aerospace components and assemblies

name: ISO 14001
description: Environmental Management Systems standard for organizations committed to reducing their environmental impact.

name: IATF 16949
description: Automotive Quality Management System standard specifically for the automotive industry supply chain.
scope: Manufacturing of automotive components and systems
